abstract: Scale Venture Partners is saying adios to Bank of America as it closes its second fund. The former venture arm of Bank of America (BA Venture Partners) said Wednesday that because of high demand from outside investors to participate in the $400 million fund, the bank made a graceful exit from the fund.
lead_paragraph: Scale Venture Partners is saying adios to Bank of America as it closes its second fund. The former venture arm of Bank of America (BA Venture Partners) said Wednesday that because of high demand from outside investors to participate in the $400 million fund, the bank made a graceful exit from the fund.

headline.main: Bank of America Bids Adieu to Venture Arm
